title: Make logo and bike card 3D

requirements.text: Convert the logo image in the header (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/header[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/img[1]) to a 3D rendered element using Three.js and React Three Fiber, maintaining the circular winged emblem design with metallic chrome appearance and rotating animation
acceptanceCriteria: Logo in header is rendered as a 3D Three.js scene
3D logo maintains the circular winged emblem design from the uploaded image
Logo rotates smoothly on the Y-axis
3D logo is responsive and scales appropriately with the header

requirements.text: Convert the bike cards in the gallery section (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[2]/div[1]/div[2]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]) to 3D rendered motorcycle models using Three.js and React Three Fiber with interactive rotation on hover
acceptanceCriteria: Each bike card displays a 3D motorcycle model instead of a static image
3D models are styled to match the bike types (sport bikes with appropriate colors: red, black, white)
Users can rotate the 3D bike models by hovering or dragging
3D models load performantly without blocking the UI
Bike specifications and pricing remain visible below the 3D model
3D scenes maintain aspect ratio and responsiveness across screen sizes

constraints: Only modify the two selected elements identified by their XPath expressions
Preserve all existing bike data, specifications, and pricing information
Maintain the current page layout and responsive design
nonGoals: Adding 3D effects to other page elements not selected
Changing the color scheme or typography
Modifying the contact section or footer
Adding new bike models or changing bike data
